TopicTitle: Missing part RS-AD in VAB after unlocking "Construction and Expansion"

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows x64 | CPU: I7-10750H | GPU: RTX 2060 | RAM: 16G

 

After buying the « Construction and Expansion » upgrade with 230 science (first column, 3rd upgrade in 2nd page of science), I tried to construct another spaceship with some of those new shiny pieces. But the two « RS-AD.. » pieces seem to be missing from the constructor. The other pieces of the same upgrade are all present.

Edited December 29, 2023 by The Space Peacock
